name: Insight Extraction
description: Extract key insights and patterns from content
template:
Please analyze the following content and extract key insights:

Content to Analyze:
{content}

Analysis Requirements:
- Identify main themes and patterns
- Extract actionable insights
- Highlight important trends or connections
- Focus on: {analysis_focus}
- Provide supporting evidence for each insight

Key Insights:

variables.name: content
variables.description: The content to analyze for insights

variables.name: analysis_focus
variables.description: Specific aspect to focus the analysis on

author: Selene System
